content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. Can I please have your name to get started?
Thank you, Jenna! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your location?
Uh, I live kind of in the outskirts, just past the main highway. Near those new apartments.
Thanks! Could you please provide your full street address (including city and zip code) to make sure our team can reach you?
I think it’s… hmm, honestly I’m not sure what it’s called. It’s that new road across from the gas station. My phone keeps autocorrecting everything so I can’t really send it right now.

No worries! Whenever you’re able, please provide your full address with street name, city, and zip code—this will help us confirm if we can assist you. Let me know if you need help locating this info!
Maybe I’ll try again later. This is so annoying. Never mind.
reason: Customer unable or unwilling to provide address; could not proceed with booking.
